pullRequest.title: make the gitignore more specific for content within the .idea directory
pullRequest.bodyText:
make the gitignore more specific for content within the .idea directory

This addressed an issue for me where I had local diffs for the com_google_protobuf_protobuf_java_3_5_1.xml, org_powermock_powermock_api_mockito2_2_0_2.xml, ... files but was not aware of it.

commit.message: make the gitignore more specific for content within the .idea directory

nodes.bodyText: Normally, I'd remind someone that changes to this file also need to be made to the other .iml file, but this is basically a no-op.
nodes.diffHunk:
